components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: THE VEHICLE STALLED, WHICH MADE IT DIFFICULT TO CONTROL.  *JB  THE FUEL INJECTOR PUMP FAILED.  GM WILL NOT HELP BECAUSE THE VEHICLE IS OUT OF WARRANTY.  EACH FAILURE ENDED IN THE REPLACEMENT OF THE PUMP.  THE SRS LIGHT WAS INTERMITTENT AND THE CRUISE CONTROL WOULD NOT ACTIVATE.  THE THROTTLE PEDAL WAS REPLACED, CODES WERE CLEARED, AND THE PUMP SET WAS REPLACED.  THERE WAS ENGINE OIL LEAKAGE.  THE COOLER LINES WERE REPLACED.  SCC
